participant_1.background:
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
my mother is in the hospital.
i love pizza.
to stay in shape , i chase cheetahs at the zoo.
i wear a uniform to work.

participant_2.background:
I need to find a more constructive way to deal with my emotions.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.
I am sad my dog died but I still enjoy playing sports even though I'm allergic to apples.
I try to stay fit and healthy by cooking nutritious meals and lifting weights.
I am from a place where rain is always welcome.

content.text: I hope you are doing well.
I am doing alright. I am sad about my dog dying recently, but I am trying to focus on the good times I had with him.
I am sorry to hear that. I am sure you gave him a great life.
Thank you. I try to do my best.
I know how you feel. My mother is in the hospital right now.
I am sorry to hear that. I hope she gets better soon.
Thank you. I am trying to stay positive.
That is the best thing you can do. I am sure she will be okay.
In the meantime, I hope you are able to find some peace and comfort.
I am here for you if you need anything.
